title: Backup Cases to Big Object
overview: Automatically backs up Case records closed more than two years ago to a Salesforce Big Object. A scheduled batch job regularly identifies Cases with a ClosedDate older than two years and securely transfers relevant data to the Big Object, enabling efficient long-term storage, improved compliance, and optimized data management.
